bike.description: Monoque C-4 carbon with custom uni-directional carbon strands, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-4 carbon  stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-440 Fuji Carbon Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer
Shimano Ulterga HollowTech II w/ Integrated spindle, 7075 CNC 39/53T Chainrings
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Shimano Ultegra dual pivot w/cartridge pad
Cane Creek 1 1/8" Integrated, w/ Convex hollow alloy spacer
Fuji UltraLite 6061 Double Butted, 31.8mm w/Anatomical drops
NEW San Marco Ponza w/Embossed logo and cro-mo rails
